content: Former Radio 1 DJ Annie Macmanus, better known as Annie Mac, invites famous guests from the worlds of music, literature, film and television to join her to chat about the biggest life shifts they have been confronted by. From bereavements to health scares and parenthood, each interview is engaging and insightful and highlights how change, even if it is unexpected, can be a force for good.Available on Apple Podcasts and Spotify.
